## Learning Objectives

By the end of the class, students should be able to:

-   Describe the purpose of confidence intervals

-   Generate a bootstrap confidence interval

-   Generate a CLT-based confidence interval for the sample mean

## Class prep

[Introduction to Modern Statistics chapter 12](https://openintro-ims.netlify.app/foundations-bootstrapping) (specifically, up to 12.4)

By the end of the reading, you should be able to answer the following questions:

-   What is bootstrapping and why do we use it?

-   What information does a confidence interval provide?
